official-title.#text:
To amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide for the non-application of the waiting
			 period for disability insurance benefits in cases of terminally ill
			 beneficiaries, and for other purposes.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was referred to the
sponsor.#text: Ms. Michelle Lujan Grisham of New Mexico

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Jeremy Sanchez Social Security Disability Insurance Fairness Act
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Jeremy Sanchez Social Security Disability Insurance Fairness Act

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
is amended by adding at the end the
			 following:

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Section 223(a) of the Social Security Act

header.#text:
Non-application of waiting period for disability insurance benefits in cases of terminally ill
			 beneficiaries

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall be applied
			 without regard to the waiting period referred to in such paragraph if—

text.#text:
In the case of any application for disability insurance benefits filed by an individual who is
			 determined to be under a disability,
the individual is terminally ill, or

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
determines that the application of the waiting period would
			 work an undue hardship on such individual (as determined on the basis of
			 criteria established by the

text.#text:
For the purposes of this paragraph, an individual is considered to be terminally ill if the
			 individual has a medical prognosis that the individual’s life expectancy
			 is 12 months or less.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall apply with respect to applications for monthly insurance
			 benefits filed on or after the date of the enactment of this Act.
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Jeremy Sanchez Social Security Disability Insurance Fairness Act/s:2

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HR 4893 IH: Jeremy Sanchez Social Security Disability Insurance Fairness Act
